description.ko: 백색광이 유리 매질을 통해 고유한 색상으로 분리되는 순간을 포착한 빛의 과학을 아름답게 표현한 작품입니다. 이 이미지는 광학 물리학의 명료함, 정밀함, 그리고 자연스러운 아름다움을 강조합니다.
description.en: A beautiful representation of light science, capturing the exact moment white light splits into its constituent colors through a glass medium. The image emphasizes clarity, precision, and the natural beauty of optical physics.

prompt: A high-resolution macro photography shot of a triangular crystal prism refracting a single beam of pure white light into a vivid, scattered rainbow spectrum. The background is a clean, minimalist soft-grey studio setting. Intricate caustic light patterns on the surface, sharp focus on the glass edges, ethereal glow, hyper-realistic textures, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting.
